author: bvahdat
msg: CAMEL-4980: Instruct the cxf-codegen-plugin globally at the parent pom level.

author: stefan2
msg: Workaround of an APR flaw that can cause FSFS corruption
if representation sharing has been enabled. We must first
flush write buffers and *then* remove data from the file.
(svn_io_file_trunc): make sure that stale data does not get written

msg: Validation on email address.  Maybe we want to do this programmatically as it was removed for some reason??
